synopsis.text:
Kingdom of Alcait's legendary mage, Dunbalf, is revered in the virtual reality world of Ark Earth Online. Behind the long white beard and powerful spells is Sakimori Kagami, a dedicated gamer who spent years perfecting his avatar. One fateful night, Kagami decides to use an expiring cosmetic kit, transforming Dunbalf into a beautiful young girl for fun. However, when he wakes up, he finds himself trapped in the game as Mira, a cute girl with Dunbalf's powers.

Now, Kagami must navigate the world he knows so well in a new body, concealing his true identity while trying to uncover the mystery behind his sudden transformation. As Mira, the supposed pupil of the wise man Dunbalf who vanished 30 years ago, Kagami embarks on a quest to find the missing mages and restore his reputation. With the fate of Alcait hanging in the balance, can Kagami prove his legacy as the legendary mage Dunbalf and save the kingdom? Join Mira in this thrilling adventure filled with magic, mystery, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
